definition: to be an eyesore/(fig.) to spoil the fun/to be a wet blanket
see 大殺風景|大杀风景[da4 sha1 feng1 jing3]
Petrified forest scenic area in Shilin Yi autonomous county 石林彞族自治縣|石林彝族自治县[Shi2 lin2 Yi2 zu2 Zi4 zhi4 xian4] in Kunming 昆明[Kun1 ming2], Yunnan
Jiuzhaigou Valley Scenic and Historical Interest Area, Sichuan
pinyin: Jiu3 zhai4 gou1 Feng1 jing3 ming2 sheng4 qu1

definition: variant of 煞風景|煞风景[sha1 feng1 jing3]
to be a blot on the landscape/to dampen spirits/to spoil the fun/to be a wet blanket

sentences.english: This splendid region of mountains and valleys contains many wonderful hot springs.
sentences.chinese: 这个风景英俊山区和上庄储藏着很多温泉。

sentences.english: Huizhou located at Xizhi Jiang nearby, the fine scenery, suits the housing.
sentences.chinese: 惠州位于西枝江旁，风景优美，适合居住。

sentences.english: See it when I was in a two day off-site meeting for the team.
sentences.chinese: 我在一个为期两天小组会议的场外看到的风景。

sentences.english: The sightseer on the tower watches you.
sentences.chinese: 看风景的人在楼上看你。

sentences.english: Joseph draws such that flowers and plants and landscape painting have the standard suitable.
sentences.chinese: 约瑟夫画得花卉与风景画具有相当水准。

sentences.english: I haven't done many portraits, but I could paint landscapes in my sleep.
sentences.chinese: 我画的肖像画不多，但是我闭着眼也能画风景。

sentences.english: The view is of the nondescript building across the street.
sentences.chinese: 风景就是对面街那不可名状的建筑物。

sentences.english: We chose a low sofa that does not block the views.
sentences.chinese: 我们选了一个很矮的沙发，不会挡住风景。

sentences.english: Tarpaulin, can be seen everywhere in China and is said not only very unique landscape.
sentences.chinese: 篷布，在中国不仅随处可见而且是道很独特的风景。

sentences.english: Videos of neutral content, such as landscapes, induce no such response.
sentences.chinese: 风景画这样平和的内容便不会引起这样的反应。

sentences.english: South Africa Has Beautiful Scenery, Mild Climate , "Rainbow Country"Good Name.
sentences.chinese: 南非风景娟秀，天气温顺，有“彩虹之国”的美称。

sentences.english: Beyong her and far below is an immense rocky landscape.
sentences.chinese: 在离她更远更深的地方是一片巨大的岩石风景。

sentences.english: First off we are going to create a mask on the landscape image.
sentences.chinese: 首先，在风景图片上创建一个蒙版。

sentences.english: Scenery near the West Lake is actually a love picture.
sentences.chinese: 西湖边的风景，确是一幅爱情的画卷。

sentences.english: Jike quietly contemplates a picturesque scene on a magazine page hung on the wall;
sentences.chinese: 尼西静静地凝视着墙上挂着的杂志封面上独特的风景。

sentences.english: Yesterday, , we went to a big family picnic Dishuiyan Scenic Area.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我们一大家子去滴水岩风景区里野餐。

definition: scenic lakes and mountain (idiom); beautiful lake and mountain landscape
